property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Ultra Shield Plus: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 5 cards of your deck under 1 of your shields. (Each card stack is considered to be 1 shield.) Double Breaker

card.name: Baiken, Blue Dragon of the Hidden Blade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker If this card is discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, put it into the battle zone instead of the graveyard. If you do, you may choose 1 creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. When you use the "Ninja Strike" ability of your Shinobi you may draw a card.

card.name: Alexander the 3rd, Emperor of the Demonic Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker When you cast a light, water, or darkness spell from your hand or graveyard, if you have at least 1 other Knight in the battle zone you may search your deck. You may choose a spell from it with the same name as the spell you just cast and cast it without cost. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed Attacker When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cross 1 of your cross gears with this creature without paying the mana cost. This creature can attack untapped creatures. Double Breaker At the end of your turn, return this creature to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Quatro Breaker (This creature breaks 4 shields.) Whenever this creature would be destroyed, put it back into your deck instead, and then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. Your opponent's creatures can't break more than 1 shield per attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 7 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 other creature in the battle zone and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck. That creature's owner reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reach a non-evolution creature, puts that creature into the battle zone, and then puts the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 7 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. During this turn, that creature gets -6000 power. When this creature is destroyed and you have at least 1 darkness card in your mana zone, you may put 1 of your shields into your graveyard instead.

card.name: Crimson Lion God, the Roaring Flame

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 8 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 8 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures with 3000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all Samurai in your graveyard into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Ninja Strike 7 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return 1 spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Until the end of your next turn, all of the shields you add to your hand gain "Shield Trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker After you use a "Shield Plus" ability, you may look at the shield you chose with that "Shield Plus" ability. When your opponent breaks your shields, you choose which shield is broken.

card.name: Sir Bubble Helma, the Ice Fang

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may show any number of spells in your hand to your opponent. Each player may draw 1 card for each spell shown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each player`s turn, that player may draw a card. If they do, that player discards a card.

card.name: Demotory the 5th, Demonic Eyed Death Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker When your creatures block or become blocked you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Knight add it to your hand.

card.name: August the 3rd, Emperor of the Demonic Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature or another creature into the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your opponent`s creatures with the same power as the creature you put into the battle zone. Whenever you cast a spell you may look at your opponent`s hand and discard 1 spell with the same cost as the spell you cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, play rock-paper-scissors with your opponent. If you win, return 1 of your creatures with a cost of 5 or less from your graveyard to the battle zone. If your opponent reveals "paper" you may return 1 of your creatures with a cost of 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets -1000 power for each of your opponent's shields. If this creature has more than 6000 power it gets "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 cross gear from your deck, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. All of your creatures with the name Bolbalzak "Sword Flash" Dragon get "Speed Attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have the next creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1. When you put that creature into the battle zone it gains "Speed Attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Snow Faerie. When you have 3 or 4 shields, all of your creatures get +2000 power. When you have 2 or less shields, all of your creatures get +4000 power. All of your creatures with 6000 or more power get "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 cross gear from your mana zone into the battle zone and cross it with this creature without paying its cost. This creature breaks 1 more shield for each cross gear crossed with this creature. Whenever this creature would leave play due to an opponent's spell, you may put 1 of the cross gears crossed with this creature into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 3 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, 1 creature in your battle zone gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Blocker] Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose 1 of your opponent's cross gears and put it in its owner's graveyard. This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Sir De Ashis, Mystic Light Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your opponent's creatures attack, if at least 1 of your shields has been broken this turn, untap this creature. This creature gets +5000 power and "Blocker" until the end of that turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Accelerator (While a creature in your battle zone is crossed with a cross gear, it gets the following [Accelerator] ability.) [Accelerator] : This creature gets +3000 power and "Double Breaker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Samurai Generation (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand without paying its cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a cross gear, you may put it into the battle zone and untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 race, then look at your opponent's hand. You may choose 1 card with the chosen race from your opponent's hand. If you do, that player discards that card and chooses 1 of their shields and puts it in their graveyard. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. If your other Shinobi would leave the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your other creatures instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -5000 power until the end of this turn. If you cast this spell form your graveyard with the ability of "Romanoff the 1st, Lord of the Demonic Eye", all of your opponent's other creatures get -5000 power until the end of this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 6 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 4000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, play rock-paper-scissors with your opponent. If you win, this creature gets "Speed Attacker" until the end of that turn. If your opponent reveals "rock", destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 2000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature gets "Power Attacker +3000" and can attack untapped God creatures. When the crossed creature battles a God creature, it gets +12000 power. When the crossed creature attacks a God creature for the 1st time in a turn, untap the crossed creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, this creature gets +5000 power until the end of that turn. When this creature has over 6000 power, it gets "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} X (When this cross gear is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may generate it, and cross it with a creature without paying its cost.) Cross Gear When you put this cross gear into the battle zone, you may cross it to one of your creatures without paying its cost. Shield Plus: When the crossed creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck face down under 1 of your shields. (Each card stack is considered to be 1 shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear When the crossed creature attacks, play rock-paper-scissors with your opponent. If you win, you may put a Samurai with a cost equal to or less than the number of cards in your mana zone into your battle zone from your mana zone. If the opponent reveals "scissors" put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. Shield Force (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields. While the chosen shield remains in the shield zone, this creature gains the following [Sheild Force] ability.) [Sheild Force] : All of your creatures gain the Knight race in addition to their current race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 4 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, until the start of your next turn, one of your creature's gains "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When this creature blocks, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures and tap it. At the end of this turn, untap 1 of your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When other creatures are put into the battle zone, this creature gains "Blocker" until the end of that turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Plus: When this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, you may put the top card of your deck under 1 of your shields. (Each card stack is considered to be 1 shield.)

card.name: Genius Janit, of the Hidden Blade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 4 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, return 1 creature in the battle zone with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Your opponent chooses 1 of their untapped creatures and returns it to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. That creature must attack next turn, if possible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 2 (Whenever your opponent attacks or blocks, if you have 2 or more cards in your mana zone and you haven't used a Ninja Strike ability this attack, you may summon this Shinobi without cost. At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, until the end of the turn 1 of your creatures in the battle zone gains "Slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may have the next spell you cast during this turn costs up to 3 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Knight Magic] : Your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and discards it. Knight Magic (If there is a Knight in your battle zone, you may use this spell's [Knight Magic] ability once more.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of your Samurai creatures in the battle zone gain "Speed Attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When 1 of your Shinobi in the battle zone would be put on the bottom of your deck, you may put 1 card in your mana zone into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then draw cards equal to the number of cards you put on the bottom of your deck plus 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear When the crossed creature attacks, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Choose up to 3 Shinobi from your deck and show them to your opponent. Put 1 of these into your hand (without showing the opponent which one) and return the rest to your deck. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Accelerator (While this creature is crossed with a cross gear, this creature gains the following [Accelerator] ability.) [Accelerator] : This creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your other Shinobi would leave the battle zone, you may put them into your mana zone instead.
